blog.name: toenail-stink-hate-echo-chamber
blog.title: Steve Rogers Defense + Tony Hate = This Blog 🤷🏼‍♀️
blog.description: My place to vent. Unabashed echo chamber. Not here to debate, just here to hate. Don’t @ me. For positive, toenail-free MCU posts click <a href="https://www.tumblr.com/blog/team-everyone-but-toenail/">here<a/>

tags: only on tumblr is this a hot take
body:
Rant

If you’re gonna shit on Carol Danvers cause you wanna pretend she’s bland (looking at you faux woke part of tumblr) but y’all are still sucking at the teet of t*ny st*tk OR because you’re conveniently okay with countless men being ridiculously overpowered (Thor nearly killed Thanos with ONE hit hellooooo???) but not okay with Carol having any of that? Bye bitch.

Wanna criticize the mcu for taking 10 fucking years before making a female led superhero movie? By all means. But women are not the enemy here. Larson? Who got SHIT on for saying she wants more inclusivity? Who had her movie trashed by butthurt, racist, misogynistic assholes before it was even out? She is not the enemy here.

Y’all are more than fine with the MCU introducing white guy after white guy after white guy into the MCU in leading roles, supporting roles, villains, heroes, but the first movie led by a woman and now is when you guys reached your “not progressive enough” limit because she’s white? Wow. Shocking.

RDJ can do blackface but Brie Larson can’t even exist despite being an ally. Or on the other side of the fandom - y’all will worship Chris Evans and Steve Rogers but Brie Larson is an eye-roll-enducing sack of lame? Do you see my point yet?

If being woke means I shouldn’t be glad that I finally see someone like Captain Marvel on the big screen then I’m not woke. But guess what - being glad that Captain Marvel exists doesn’t mean people don’t ALSO want an MCU movie led by a woman of colour, or by people of the LGTBQIA, or by any other minority besides “woman.”

I’m just so sick of tumblr culture that unless something is THE most progressive thing then it’s worthless and it’s okay to shit all over it, instead of continuing to push for more progressive things that will connect with more and more audiences on deeper and deeper levels. Especially when people front and center of said progressive-but-not-the-most-progessive-thing are using her platform and privilege to bring to light issues we need to deal with on the road to complete progressiveness.

I know that “white woman leads mcu movie” is not the goal post. But can we at least be allowed to be glad that we have moved closer to it?

Anyway that’s my hot take.

body:
Captain Marvel

WOW! I’m lost for words after seeing captain marvel. It was amazing! It’s so hard to explain why it’s such a good movie without spoilers so I’m just going to say you should definitely go watch it. I totally wasn’t expecting anything that happened. If you do go see it go in with no spoilers/knowing nothing that will happen because it will blow you away!
